snippet: Senators who voted against the governor’s nominee, Bruce A. Harris, said he lacked pertinent experience to be a member of the state’s highest court.
abstract: New Jersey Senate panel rejects Bruce A Harris, Gov Chris Christie's nominee to the State Supreme Court, saying Harris lacks experience; decision is latest blow to the governor's attempt to reshape the state's highest court.

byline.original: By KATE ZERNIKE and NATE SCHWEBER

lead_paragraph: Senators who voted against the governor’s nominee, Bruce A. Harris, said he lacked pertinent experience to be a member of the state’s highest court.

headline.seo: Christie Pick for New Jersey Supreme Court, Bruce Harris, Is Rejected
headline.main: Legislative Panel Rejects 2nd Christie Pick for State Supreme Court
headline.print_headline: Legislative Panel Rejects 2nd Christie Pick for State Supreme Court
